You are my son. Out of the affection and love I have for you, I intend to give you some real estate free of charge, which is my ancestral property, in the accounts of the Panchayat. I hereby grant to you, free of charge, the immovable property listed in the Schedule hereunder, registered in my name and having been in my absolute possession from that date to this day, together with all the rights I have, water, treasury deposits, common water ways, common ways, easement rights, etc., and hereby transfer the said property listed in the Schedule hereunder to you. Therefore, from now on, you shall be the full owner of the property and shall enjoy it freely and freely, with full rights of gift and sale, as you please, subject to paying all taxes due to the Government. In this regard, I, my heirs, will settle all the encumbrances, encumbrances, and any other obstacles that may arise from my knowledge, at my own expense, and will continue to implement the Scheduled Property in this manner.
I hereby give you this settlement deed in your name, believing that this property is an undisputed and unalienable property to which no other person has previously made any mortgages, purchases, purchase agreements, leases, guarantees, etc.
. There are no other heirs, male or female, or rightful owners of this property except me. This property has not been assigned under Government Act No. 9/77. The agreements are hereby filed for the registration of this property in your name. ch.v.prisd

Declaration-1:- There are no mango, coconut, sweet potato trees, betel nut plantations, granite minerals, fish ponds, missionary etc. in the property as per schedule. I hereby declare that I am fully liable for the payment of depreciation tax on the same.

Declaration-2:- I hereby declare that the property as per schedule described in this document belongs to me alone and that I have not previously encroached upon the said property to any other person and that I shall be liable to the punishment mentioned in section-82 of the Registration Act, 1908, if I am found to have violated the provisions of section-22B of the Registration Act, 1908.

Scanned with OKEN Scanner I declare that I have all the necessary details in my name, including the title deeds, tax receipts and government issued identity documents relating to the property. I have submitted. I hereby certify that I have not transferred/alienated/registered the property in this document to anyone before and that no one else has any right to transfer the said property except me. This document is being written and registered in the name of the person who has written it. Neither the Sub-Registrar nor the staff of his office nor the clerk who prepared the draft can have any relation or responsibility in relation to this settlement document written and registered today. The document has been prepared and registered with the details provided by me. I hereby declare that I am willing to issue any amendment/agreement/additional document(s) to this document in writing, if required, without any compensation or delay from the undersigned. I hereby certify that all the information I have provided is true and that if any of the information provided by me is found to be false in the future, I shall be fully responsible for all legal actions and transactions relating to such information. Declaration of the undersigned
I have personally examined and shown to the experts all the necessary details such as the title deeds, encumbrance certificate and identity documents of the undersigned and after verifying the truthfulness of the said details, I hereby register this deed from the undersigned. Therefore, I hereby declare that I am fully responsible for all the transactions related to this property.
Neither the Sub-Registrar, his office staff nor the draftsman can have any relation or responsibility in relation to this settlement deed written and registered today. This deed has been prepared and registered only on the basis of the details furnished by me.

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 22483 of 2024, dated 17/May/2024, executed by Chetakala Varaprasad, in favour of his Son, Chetakala Ashok, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 146.67 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 5-170 Dismantled, Assessment No. 995, comprised in survey number 268, situated in Karakuduru Village and Gramapanchayat, Pedapudi Mandal, within the District of Kakinada, registered at sub-registrar office Samalkota is bounded as follows: North by: 40 Ft. C.C. Road South by: 40 Ft. House of Nemmadhi Sattiyya East by: 33 Ft. C.C. Road West by: 33 Ft. House of Jalimi Rajarao
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible
